name: Perma-Top™ Patch Kit
description: Perma-Top™ Patch Kit is a three-component, pigmented, VOC compliant 100% epoxy/aggregate combination patching compound for concrete floors. It is self-priming and will withstand heavy impact from continuous forklift traffic or steel-wheeled equipment. It repairs holes and wide cracks in concrete floors. It can be applied in openings as small as 1/8” (3.18 mm) up to any depth in need of repair.
